column2: Prognostic Value of the 6-minute Stepper Test in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer Surgery
column6: The objective of this study is to evaluate the performances of the Six-Minute Stepper Test (6MST) and Sit To Stand test (STST) to predict post-operative complications after minimally invasive lung cancer resection.
column8: Lung Neoplasm Malignant|Resectable Lung Non-Small Cell Carcinoma
column9: DIAGNOSTIC_TEST: Six minutes stepper test (6MST)|DIAGNOSTIC_TEST: Sit to stand test (STST)
